    Historical COPOM dates

    get_copom_dates.Rd

    Historical COPOM dates since 2015.

    get_copom_dates(date = NULL, n = 8)

    Arguments

    date

    reference date

    n

    number of dates returned

    If `date` is `NULL` all dates are returned. Once `date` is set, `n` dates greater than or equal to `date` are returned.

    Value

    A vector with `Date` objects.

    Examples

    get_copom_dates()
#>  [1] "2015-01-21" "2015-03-04" "2015-04-29" "2015-06-03" "2015-07-29"
#>  [6] "2015-09-02" "2015-10-21" "2015-11-25" "2016-01-20" "2016-03-02"
#> [11] "2016-04-27" "2016-06-08" "2016-07-20" "2016-08-31" "2016-10-19"
#> [16] "2016-11-29" "2017-01-11" "2017-02-22" "2017-04-12" "2017-05-31"
#> [21] "2017-07-26" "2017-09-06" "2017-10-25" "2017-12-06" "2018-02-07"
#> [26] "2018-03-21" "2018-05-16" "2018-06-20" "2018-08-01" "2018-09-19"
#> [31] "2018-10-31" "2018-12-12" "2019-02-06" "2019-03-20" "2019-05-08"
#> [36] "2019-06-19" "2019-07-31" "2019-09-18" "2019-10-30" "2019-12-11"
#> [41] "2020-02-05" "2020-03-18" "2020-05-06" "2020-06-17" "2020-08-05"
#> [46] "2020-09-16" "2020-10-28" "2020-12-09" "2021-01-20" "2021-03-17"
#> [51] "2021-05-05" "2021-06-16" "2021-08-04" "2021-09-22" "2021-10-27"
#> [56] "2021-12-08" "2022-02-02" "2022-03-16" "2022-05-04" "2022-06-15"
#> [61] "2022-08-03" "2022-09-21" "2022-10-26" "2022-12-07" "2023-01-18"
#> [66] "2023-02-28"
get_copom_dates("2022-01-04", 4)
#> [1] "2022-02-02" "2022-03-16" "2022-05-04" "2022-06-15"
